verbose_text: It was also observed that the proliferation rate of thyroid papillary carcinoma-1 (TPC-1) cancer cell line and the AC tumor growth in a mouse model was significantly reduced by the knockdown of gal-1 [XREF_BIBR], which represents an additional argument for the diagnostic and therapeutic value of this biomarker.
evidence: proliferation rate of thyroid papillary carcinoma-1 (TPC-1) cancer cell line and the AC tumor growth in a mouse model was significantly reduced by the knockdown of gal-1
